HDG.DL.content: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]

HDG.LP.content: Trakl calls unborn “grandsons” because they do not continue decaying generation [Geschlecht], they are another Generation (andere Generation) [sweeping summary in one sentence: pain, vision, flame, look ahead into withdrawing earliness, ghosts]
